tight as i do chances are your jaw won t be as squared as mine when the stuffing is added this will make the eyes look like they re positioned too high the size of the eyes also plays a key role here consider using bigger eyes or positioning them 1 round lower if this is your first doll using my patterns you might want to make more than 1 try and add an eyelash to size the result you can also make
